geo.name: Africa
geo.description: The entire African continent plus Madagascar and some islands.

geo.name: Europe
geo.description: West and East Europe as defined by Gapmidner, to make up roughly a quarter of the world's total land surface.

geo.name: The Americas
geo.description: North and South America as defined by Gapmidner, to make up roughly a quarter of the world's total land surface.

geo.name: Asia
geo.description: Asia as defined by Gapmidner, to make up roughly a quarter of the world's total land surface.
